title: Follow live: Edwards, Wolves off to hot start vs. Warriors in Game 2
author: ESPN staff

title: Irked Devers tells Red Sox he won't switch to 1B
description: Rafael Devers said the Red Sox approached him about the idea of filling in as Boston's first baseman but said it's not in his best interest to make another position switch.

title: 'Man Utd know how to win trophies. Tottenham don't'
description: When Manchester United and Tottenham face off it will be the sixth all-English final in a major European competition - with half of them involving Spurs.

title: 'It's going to upset a lot of people' - Postecoglou hits back at critics
description: Ange Postecoglou took aim at Tottenham's critics after they reached the Europa League final as he remains on course to continue his record of wining a trophy in his second season.

title: Arteta's Arsenal at a crossroads - it's time for ruthlessness
description: When Mikel Arteta signed his new Arsenal contract in September, he was asked what his main objective is for the club. "To win," he said. "It has to be that. It has to be that aim."

title: Humphries beats Littler in thriller to go back-to-back in his beloved Leeds
description: Luke Humphries defeated great rival Luke Littler 6-5 as he claimed Premier League Darts victory in Leeds for a second straight year to reach the Play-Offs.

title: Desmond Ridder not expected to attend Broncos minicamp due to scheduling conflict
description: The Denver Post reports Desmond Ridder is not expected to attend Broncos rookie minicamp.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 12 - Howie Dallmar (1946-49)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Dallmar wore only jersey No. 12 and put up 9.6 points and 2.3 assists per game.
